attributes.action: To legislate for the creation of an English Parliament in 2015
attributes.additional_details: We respectfully request that this important question be afforded discussion time in our next Parliament, with a view to future legislation.  We believe that England is entitled to equality within the United Kingdom and that the creation of an English Parliament will balance the scales, enabling English MP's to vote on English only issues.  This then provides the people of England with the same freedoms and respect, afforded to all other countries within the United Kingdom.

rejection.details:
Please see the petition below:

Petition Title: English parliament

Created by: June Williams

Closing: 30/03/2015
